channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Russia’s Top Prosecutor Applies for Supreme Court Chief Justice Post
item.description: The top court position has been vacant since the death of the previous chief justice more than a month ago.

item.title: Ukraine Criticizes Woody Allen for Speaking at Moscow Film Week
item.description: The four-time Oscar-winning director appeared virtually as the guest of honor at Moscow International Film Week.

item.title: Russian Swimmer Missing After Bosphorus Race in Turkey
item.description: Nikolai Svechnikov reportedly failed to reach the finish line of the Bosphorus Cross-Continental Swim, which drew more than 2,800 swimmers.

item.title: Bucear atrae a Cuba a viajeros intrépidos
item.description: La Habana, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) El deseo de buscar aventuras nuevas relacionadas con los fondos marinos atrae hoy a viajeros de todo el mundo que persiguen vacaciones activas, en lugares tan interesantes como Cuba. The post Bucear atrae a Cuba a viajeros int

item.title: Falla técnica pone pausa a Expedición Uruguay-200
item.description: Montevideo, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) El buque científico Falkor retorna hoy a puerto por fallas técnicas lo cual puso causa a la expedición científica “Uruguay Sub-200. Viaje a lo desconocido” que pretende estudiar el fondo del mar continental uruguayo. The post

item.title: ONU alerta sobre efectos de calor extremo en millones de trabajadores
item.description: Naciones Unidas, 25 ago (Prensa Latina) Más de dos mil 400 millones de trabajadores están expuestos al calor extremo en el mundo, lo cual constituye hoy una amenaza para su salud, alertaron organismos de las Naciones Unidas (ONU). The post ONU alerta sobre efe

item.title: French wine exporters 'hugely disappointed' over US tariff exemption failure
item.description: (KPL/AFP) The French wine exporters federation said Thursday it was "hugely disappointed" by the European Union's admission that it failed to secure a tariff exemption for the sector in the US-EU trade deal.
